name: Education Champions
title: Unbeatable School Retention
description: In 2020, Chile achieved a 100% persistence rate for males to both grade 5 and the last grade of primary school, showcasing the country's commitment to education.

name: Youth in School
title: Lowest School Dropout Rates
description: As of 2022, only 0.11% of Chilean male adolescents of lower secondary school age were out of school, indicating a strong educational system.

name: Healthcare Affordability
title: Minimal Poverty from Healthcare Costs
description: In 2016, only 0.01% of Chile's population was pushed below the $3.65 poverty line due to out-of-pocket healthcare expenses, reflecting effective healthcare policies.

name: Global Aid Receiver
title: Significant UN Support
description: In 2017, Chile received $147,774 from UNFPA, highlighting its reliance on international aid for development projects.
